Package joelib2.smarts

Provides classes for searching substructures in chemical structures based on the Smiles ARbitrary Target Specification (SMARTS) standard [].

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
QueryAtomSpecification TODO description.
QueryBondSpecification TODO description.
QueryPattern TODO description.
QueryPatternMatcher TODO description.
SMARTSPatternMatcher TODO description.
 

Class Summary
BasicQueryAtomSpecification Atom specification of a SMARTS bond expression.
BasicQueryBondSpecification Bond specification of a SMARTS bond expression.
BasicQueryPattern SMARTS pattern representation.
BasicSMARTSPatternMatcher Class to parse SMART pattern and store the search expressions.
ParserState Holds closure bond informations.
ProgrammableAtomTyper PATtern TYper (PATTY) using SMARTS patterns.
QueryCache Pattern chache entry.
SMARTSMatcher The JOESSMatch class performs exhaustive matching using recursion Explicit stack handling is used to find just a single match in match()
SMARTSParser Contains methods for SMARTS parsing.
 

Package joelib2.smarts Description

Provides classes for searching substructures in chemical structures based on the Smiles ARbitrary Target Specification (SMARTS) standard [].
